text: Niccayamaka muslim ankalum penkalum, nampikkaiyutaiya ankalum penkalum, (iraivanukkum avanutaiya tutarukkum) kilppatiyum ankalum penkalum, unmaiye kurum ankalum penkalum, porumaiyulla ankalum penkalum, (allahvukkup) payantu natakkum ankalum penkalum, tanam ceyyum ankalum penkalum, nonpu norkum ankalum penkalum, karpulla ankalum penkalum, allahvutaiya tiruppeyarai atikamaka ninaivukurum ankalum penkalum akiya ivarkalukku allah mannippaiyum makattana kuliyaiyum tayarpatutti vaittirukkiran
